alert.note: Alert for Clay (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 09 at 10:54AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. Wild Rice River (MN) at Hendrum affecting Norman County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Red Lake River at Crookston affecting Polk County. Snake River AT Alvarado affecting Marshall County. Buffalo River near Hawley affecting Clay County. Snake River below Warren affecting Marshall County. .This morning`s river forecasts (Monday) take into account past precipitation that has occurred and forecast precipitation from 7 am this morning through 7 am Tuesday morning. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Buffalo River near Dilworth. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Gage not accessible above 15 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 13.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 14.4 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall to 13.4 feet and begin rising again Thursday morning. It will rise to 15.0 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
